Package it.unitn.disi.smatch.filters

Interface Summary
IFilter Interface for result filters.
 

Class Summary
DefaultFilter ???
IntegrationFilter ???
RandomSampleFilter Selects random sample.
RedundantFilter Filters mapping according to minimal links paper.
RedundantFilterEQ Filters the matrix according to the minimal links paper, expanding EQ into MG&LG.
RedundantGeneratorFilter Generates entailed mappings according to pseudocode from minimal mappings paper.
RemoveDJFilter Removes DJ links from the mapping.
RetainEQFilter Retains only EQ links in the mapping.
ZeroFilter Does nothing.
